about_the_game:
- Available in Bleeding Hearts: Althazar

Complete Bleeding Hearts: Althazar Game

Complete the Mission and Fight against the Threat to Home Land and the world

After Wasim Khan's defeat in the 2024 General Elections, Pakistan descended into civil war, which raged for two years. Despite requests for international peacekeeping troops, the country fractured into several independent states by 2026. One of these regions declared its independence, forming a new country called Qalbistan. This nation emerged from the merger of the Port Area and Tribal regions, with its capital named Althazar.

Althazar quickly gained notoriety as the city with the highest crime rate. It's said that 25% of the population is involved in criminal activities, 25% pays to escape crime, and the remaining 50% are victims. The lawlessness in Qalbistan is so severe that no other country is willing to accept refugees from the region, not even the peacekeeping forces, who are now trapped within its borders.

As the player, you must lead your team through this chaotic and dangerous landscape. Survival is the ultimate goal, but you also face the challenge of rescuing abducted members and finding a safe haven away from the turmoil of Qalbistan. The decisions you make will determine your team's fate as you fight to navigate the lawless streets of Althazar.

Time to Start

Welcome to the world of Althazar, the first part of Bleeding Hearts Series with great collections of maps and heavy single player action. All the maps are open world 3D with new modes and gameplay features and will be available at launch to get everyone started

High Intensity Action Levels

Find, fight, kill and rescue abducted citizens while surviving and fighting tranches of enemy soldiers, rebels and facing civilian revolt in the largest maps. Massive chases to catch enemies and race against time for completing the critical missions.

Plan for escape from the world top 1 crime city Althazar. You will be provided with different set of weapons at each level and tons of interactions to get the work done and quid pro co with available civilians to get help and conquer.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1050-Ti (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 570 (4GB) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system, better to have SSD for faster game experience
